Html: Any chance of getting that? I am sure thousands of office workers like myself would appreciate it when we are itching about WoW while behind a company filtered webbroswing computer. :(

Well Rawr does run without an internet connection, you know, as long as you don't need any more items or armory characters.

As for the iPhone, I'd love to port Rawr to the iPhone, but the UI would be quite cumbersome, and it'd have to be a complete rewrite of the whole app and all models. So probably not going to happen any time soon, sorry. :(
See what happen? What do you actually want to see happen?
